meanings.definition: A cowboy of the South American pampas.
meanings.sent1: The gaucho rode his horse across the vast plains.
meanings.sent2: The gaucho herded the cattle with skill and grace.
meanings.sent3: The gaucho tried line dancing but kept stepping on his own boots.
meanings.sent4: In the wild west of business, he was the gaucho leading his team to success.
meanings.sent5: The image of the gaucho on horseback became iconic in South America.

meanings.definition: A style of clothing associated with South American cowboys.
meanings.sent1: She wore a traditional gaucho hat to the rodeo.
meanings.sent2: The gaucho pants were loose and comfortable for riding.
meanings.sent3: He mistakenly wore gaucho boots to the beach, thinking they were sandals.
meanings.sent4: Her fashion sense was like a modern gaucho, blending comfort with style.
meanings.sent5: The gaucho attire reflected the rugged lifestyle of the cowboys.
